column5: A cozy indoor ambiance with fun outdoor activities makes for a great place to stay in Austin! My 1 bed/ 1 bath condo features a very comfy memory foam bed, unique art pieces, WIFI, Netflix & Hulu, lots of kitchen gadgets, and games! Two guests can sleep on the fold-out couch.  Outside the back deck is a green space with a sportscourt and a connector path to 5 mi of trails in the South Hills Conservation Area. Guests may also access the pool.  Welcoming to ALL!
